Key:
(After Arusu said she would make contact, she
became unresponsive for a little while.)
Heeey, Arusu?
...Access verified.
Huh? Access?
There he is! Shido, get away from her!

That voice... Kotori?! What do you mean, get
away... Hey, wait a minute! What's going on?!

She's dangerous. The game's gone bonkers, all
because of her. Not to mention she called us in
here.
Shido! We came to save you from the "geme"!
My, my, it sure is pretty rowdy from the get-go.

If you're going to hurt Shido, you won't get away
with it.

Tohka... Origami... Kurumi, too...?! You guys came
to save me? What do you mean? I wasn't in
danger...

Sh-Shido-san, you are stuck in the game.
I-It's... her fault.

Arusu's fault...? Really? Oh, come to think of it,
I couldn't get a hold of you, Kotori, or Reine-san
either...

Darling, that's totally like you. But no matter
how cute she is, she's our enemy. I think you
should get away from her～

Shido, come here. It would be wise for you to hide
behind me.

What are you talking about, Origami Tobiichi?!
I'm going to protect Shido! You come behind me!

I see... So she's the AI Spirit you mentioned.
How adorable.
AI Spirit...?
AI... Spirit...? What are you speaking of?

Hehehehe... No point in playing dumb, you fake
Spirit! You've called us forth by taking Shido
hostage... You can't get away from us now!

Hostage... To detain with the goal of gaining
something in return... I will deny that. I haven't
taken Shido Itsuka hostage at all.

Objection. For someone like you who has absolute
rule over this virtual world, Shido is nothing
more than a hostage.

I haven't used any of my restrictions against
Shido Itsuka.

What do you mean? I thought you told us to...
Anyways, you called us here, didn't you?

Come to think of it, Arusu... You did mention
some kind of search earlier.

Yes. In order to find out what love is, I did
conduct a search. I called for personnel
who could love you.

So everyone here... They're not NPCs like the ones
I bumped into earlier, but the real ones... right?

That's right. All of us. Our names
were all listed.

Yes. In this world, you guys will grow in love
with Shido Itsuka. You all were set as prospects.
What do you mean?

They were set from the beginning of this world
as attainable characters.

That's why I called for them. The people that
Shido Itsuka can love, and who could love back.
Love and love back...

I'm telling you now, it's not like that. The
sooner you wake up from this nonsense,
the sooner I can get back to work.
Then... Kotori Itsuka doesn't love Shido Itsuka?
W-Well...!
A-As his little sister... Er, as his family...
Love... um...
Then Kotori Itsuka, let me ask you. What is love?

Arusu seems to want an answer. She really wants
to know what love is...

I thought about it, but it's so hard to define,
you know? I feel like I know what it is, but when
I try to put it into words... it's really tough.
Right...

(Kotori looks like she wants to say something, but
can't...)
How about the others? What is love for you all?

Those of you who love Shido Itsuka, do you know
what love is? What kind of thing is love?

I don't know what love is really, but I like to be
with Shido. It's fun! And besides, he always gives
me yummy food!

Tohka... Is my value the same as a
vending machine?

Um... F-For example, if you think about that
person, your heart pounds and... feels warm...
Hahaaa. Yoshino, you're always lying in bed,\nbright red and thinking about Shido-kun!

So, there is a temperature change? And an
expression of happiness? However, can you not
obtain that from something other than love?

...Oh... That may be true. But it's different...
from other feelings... I think...

Isn't it the feeling of wanting the person for
yourself? Both body and heart melting and fusing
together into one...

Hey, wouldn't you say that's too soon for a
healthy high school relationship?!
W-Well, you may have a point...

How can you understand what she's talking
about...? What's your answer?

W-Well... You put a leash on them and step on them
and have some fun...?

Why did you grow up so quickly...
Ahh, come back Kotori... My
adorable little sister...
Wh-What?! You're so dumb!

Then... Kaguya and Yuzuru Yamai...
How about you two?

Hehe... Love, huh? Love is a chance meeting of
fate. With each part of one soul that is forbidden
from being separated.

Attention. You must be talking about Yuzuru.
But what this person is asking about is Shido.

What... My love for Shido... What I want... uh...
My possession?

Oh, just like me, then? Kaguya-san, you want to
become one with Shido-san too?

Sh-Sh-Sh-Shido... become one...?
Wh-Wh-Wh-What, um... Yuzuru, how about you?
Oh, I'm sad that I can't hear your answer.

Answer. It is prioritizing another before
yourself.

(That's a simple answer. Well, I can understand
why Yuzuru would say that. Kaguya and Yuzuru
do that for each other.)

(But that wasn't the case back then, so... it
feels a little different.)

Darling said no matter what happened, he'd be
my fan. That means you're always thinking of me,
right?

Fan. A supporter you mean? So it means you
support or feel loyalty toward them? Is that love?

Wh-When you put it that way, I feel like it's a
little different.
To take in everything they want is love.
That sure sounds one-sided.
Yeah! Everyone has different answers!

Hmm... I don't know if it's something that has a
uniform answer. Arusu, what do you say?

...Judging from the information I have collected
until now, I believe it is difficult to understand
love.
Well... It feels like the expected conclusion.

So then, I must simulate love and watch it grow...
That seems to be the only way to verify
what it is.

The reason why I had you all come here is because
I was considering it. This world has many events
by which to grow love.

Well, you've come to the right place. So, you're
telling me you don't plan on letting us out unless
we play along?
...What do you mean?

I'm asking if we're stuck here until you
understand what love is.
...? I don't understand your question.

Hey, wait a minute, Kotori. Arusu... You didn't
intend on trapping us in here?
I just have one goal. To know what love is.

But... your existence is an anomaly. You shouldn't
exist as a character.
If this isn't your doing, then whose is it?

...I do not know. I do not understand
every system.

Hey, Kotori...? She really doesn't seem to know.
No point in getting mad at her.

Jeez, Shido, you're always so... Well, I guess we
can't help it. She's our only hope now.

You're right... Arusu-san, was it?
What should we do?

To form and grow love in this world with Shido
Itsuka. That is all I wish for.

In other words, it's no different from usual.
If I can spend some sweet time with my darling,
it's all good!

I'm glad that time's sped up in virtual reality.
Even if we're trapped here for a few days, it'll
only be a few hours outside.

Wait, Kotori! Does this mean we can't eat for
days?! That's not good!

You can eat in this world. So deal with it here.
Shido will cook.

Jeez, you say that without asking me... but
whatever, I don't mind. So, in the end, we're
supposed to live an ordinary life here?

Yes. And the rest, this world should
push you further.

...*Sigh* I guess we have no choice but to go
along with it for a little while.

Hehe... Well I guess I can use this opportunity to
gain an advantage over the others.

Affirmative. The time to grow in love with Shido
is limited. We must strike first.
You guys, can you please take it easy...?
